full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 3 ALIEN REGISTRATION Name NUI CHAN STATEMENT OF FACTS FOR PREPARATION OF PETITION No. 195 429 SECTION OF LAW (1) My full, true, and correct name is Nul CHAN (Full, true name, without abbreviations) (2) My present place of residence is 790 FAIRFIELD CIRCLE PASADENA LOS ANGELES CA 91106 (Number and street) (City or town) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) 3 (3) I was born on 6 15 in CANTON CHINA (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, district, province, or State) (Country) (4) I am marned and have 2 living children. (City) (State) (Name of vessel or other means of conveyance) (6) I have resided continuously in the United States of America since may ( 1969 and continuously in the State of CALIFORNIA where I now live since 5 years I have been physically present in the United States for an aggregate period of 133 may (st 1969 and during the past months. If child lives with you, state "with me" in column (h), otherwise (No.) give city and State of child's residence.)
